animeTitle: Doraemon Movie 17: Nobita to Ginga Express
otherNames: Doraemon the Movie: Nobita and the Galaxy Super-express, Doraemon: Nobita's Galactic Express, 映画 ドラえもん のび太と銀河超特急[エクスプレス]
synopsis: The kids go on a space Mystery Train bound for a space theme park, when a race of alien virus strikes, wanting to take them as host bodies.
